title: Powder Monkey Esports LF D5+ Support!
body:
Powder Monkey Esports is LF D5+ Support!

Requirements:
Passionate!!!!

Please Contact  Akeno Himejima to apply

replies.body:
Hi Akeno, I'm interested in joining your team.

I'm a Master tier player and my main goal right now is to join a competitive team to gain some experience playing the game in a team environment.

I've added you on the LoL client (IGN is PIuto) and have messaged you on there.

Cheers.
